title.native: ダンス・ダンス・ダンスール

description:
Danseur noble--a ballet dancer qualified to dance the role of the prince. Second-year junior high school student Murao Junpei was fascinated by ballet as a boy, but gave up on dancing after his father's death, as he had to become a man. However, one day, a beautiful transfer student named Godai Miyako appears before him. Miyako takes notice in Junpei's love of ballet and invites him to dance with her. Along with Miyako's cousin Mori Ruou, he begins his career as a full-fledged ballet dancer, with the aim of becoming the world's best dancer--the Danseur noble! Only those who have sacrificed everything are permitted to stand in the beautiful and harsh world of classical ballet. What will be the fate of a total beginner like Junpei?!

(Source: Crunchyroll)

title.native: ダンス・ダンス・ダンスール

node.description:
[Twitter](https://twitter.com/munehisa_sakai)

Previoulsy affiliated with [Toei Animation](https://anilist.co/studio/18/Toei-Animation) and [MAPPA](https://anilist.co/studio/569/MAPPA). Currently working at [Studio KAI](https://anilist.co/studio/6312/Studio-KAI).

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hasegawa_hitomi)__ | __[Tumblr](https://hitomi-tezuka.tumblr.com/)__

__Hitomi Hasegawa__ is a Japanese animator and animation director. Currently affiliated with [MAPPA](https://anilist.co/studio/569/MAPPA).

__[Twitter](https://twitter.com/hasegawa_hitomi)__ | __[Tumblr](https://hitomi-tezuka.tumblr.com/)__

__Hitomi Hasegawa__ is a Japanese animator and animation director. Currently affiliated with [MAPPA](https://anilist.co/studio/569/MAPPA).
Previously affiliated with [Studio 4°C](https://anilist.co/studio/13/). Currently affiliated with [MAPPA](https://anilist.co/studio/569/).
__Tomoki Nagasaka__ is a Japanese editor who works for post production studio Jay Film.

__[Website](https://www.yukiweb.net/)__

She debuted in the music industry in 1991 as the lead vocalist for the rock band [JUDY AND MARY](https://anilist.co/staff/218017), and as a solo artist in 2002.

[Website](http://www.hitorie.jp/) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/hitorieJP)

After wowaka's death of acute heart failure on April 5, 2019, Shinoda took over as the band's vocals.

__Members:__
• [Shinoda](https://anilist.co/staff/270922/Shinoda) (シノダ) - vocals, guitar
• [Igarashi](https://anilist.co/staff/193364) (イガラシ) - bass
• [Yumao](https://anilist.co/staff/162408) (ゆーまお) - drums

__Former:__
• [wowaka](https://anilist.co/staff/157627) - leader, vocals, guitar

Episode 10 - Miyako... You Need to Be by His Side
Episode 11 - Oh, I Think I Love Classical Ballet
